fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- No factional kill
- No factional chat.
- Each Countryfolk role has a Job and a Background. Players who roll the role receive its Job, which consists of its abilities and attributes, but not its Background.
- After all Countryfolk roles are distributed, all players receive a Background from a random Countryfolk role. They may not receive a Background from the same role they have as a Job.
- Backgrounds will typically be chosen based on the current subalignment distribution in the rolelist (ex: if rolelist has two Countryfolk Protectives, two Countryfolk Protective Backgrounds will show up in addition to two Countryfolk Protective Jobs.)
